metadata.title: USN-7205-1 -- Django vulnerability
metadata.description: It was discovered that Django incorrectly handled certain IPv6 strings. An attacker coul possibly use this issue to cause a denial of service.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-7205-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  python-django-doc - 2:3.2.12-2ubuntu1.16 python3-django - 2:3.2.12-2ubuntu1.16 No subscription required
